MAREL.AS.summary: Marel hf. develops, manufactures, sells, and distributes processing equipment, systems, software, and services for poultry, meat, and fish industries. The company's Poultry Processing segment offers integrated systems for processing broilers, turkeys, and ducks. Its Meat Processing segment provides services in the processes of slaughtering, deboning and trimming, and case ready food service for pork, beef, veal, and sheep. The company's Fish Processing segment offers equipment and systems for farmed and wild salmon and whitefish processing. The company also provides lifecycle support, customer support center, training, process consultancy, planned maintenance, inspection visit, preventative maintenance package, calibration, consumable package, on-site emergency support, repair and exchange program, parts package, and on-site response services, as well as upgrade kits. It sells its products through a network of agents and distributors in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, Asia, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in GarÃ°abÃ¦r, Iceland.
